CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Contact.Phone )), "(" & LEFT( Contact.Phone , 3) & ") " & MID( Contact.Phone , 4, 3) & "-" & MID( Contact.Phone , 7,4) & " " & RIGHT( Contact.Phone , (LEN( Contact.Phone ) - 10)), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populated by formula based on the Contact field
CustomField.label: Contact Phone
